title: raywenderlich.com Folklore
description: I often get asked at iOS conferences and meetups, “What's it like to write for raywenderlich.com?”, “Have you ever met Ray - what's he like?”, or “How did the team grow over the years?” If you're curious about the answers to these and more - this session is for you! Take a break from the intensive tutorials in the conference, and enjoy some amusing inside stories about the team and Ray himself.

reviews.title: Zombie Review
reviews.description: Zombie ipsum reversus ab viral inferno, nam rick grimes malum cerebro. De carne lumbering animata corpora quaeritis. Summus brains sit​​, morbo vel maleficia? De apocalypsi gorger omero undead survivor dictum mauris.
reviews.name: B. Sucker

reviews.title: Meaty Review
reviews.description: Bacon ipsum dolor amet jowl pork flank officia pastrami hamburger prosciutto sed cillum kielbasa. Kielbasa boudin jowl rump magna eiusmod, swine ham deserunt ham hock shankle brisket commodo velit alcatra.
reviews.name: Bacon Grease
